contact.title: Contact

experiences.title: Experiences
experiences.description: Explore my  work experiences, As well as my work projects

contents.name: X Logic Solutions
contents.description: Recently started working as a Software developer and worked in two major languages, Next JS and Laravel.

list.name: In a Next.js project, I developed a real-time Campaign System that operates as a platform-based solution, featuring a modern, sleek design and a seamless user experience. The system includes real-world authentication mechanisms, such as OTP (One-Time Password) and email verification, ensuring secure and reliable user access.

In a Laravel project, I developed SPortzy, an e-commerce platform for sports enthusiasts using MySQLi for efficient data management. The platform offers dynamic product listings, real-time inventory management, and secure checkout options. SPortzy ensures a seamless shopping experience and includes an intuitive admin panel for straightforward product and order management.

contents.name: The Skillz
contents.description: I started working as a front-end developer. Enabling businesses to leverage the full potential:

list.name: Throughout my experience in MERN stack development, I spearheaded the creation of various modules, prominently featuring the development of an Admin Dashboard tailored for internal company use.
In addition to this, I contributed to a range of other projects within the MERN stack ecosystem.

contents.name: Hashtag Softs
contents.description: As a Intern Software Developer at Hashtag Softs, I worked in designing, developing, and maintaining software solutions that enhance operational efficiency and user satisfaction.

list.name: During my internship at hashtag softs, I worked as a Full-Stack Engineer specialized in php.I worked at hashtag softs as a Full-Stack Developer with a PHP specialty throughout my internship.

My responsibilities encompassed the development of key projects such as an online doctor appointment system and an e-commerce website, along with the implementation of various smaller modules to enhance functionality.
